transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to a recipient.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from a specified address to a recipient on behalf of the owner.

approve.description: Approves a spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance of a spender by a specified amount.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance of a spender by a specified amount.

permit.description: Permits a spender to spend tokens on behalf of the owner via a signed message.

mint.description: Mints a specified amount of new tokens to a recipient.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

BURNER_ROLE.description: Returns the bytes32 identifier for the burner role.

DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.description: Returns the bytes32 identifier for the default admin role.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR.description: Returns the domain separator used in EIP-712 signatures.

MINTER_ROLE.description: Returns the bytes32 identifier for the minter role.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by a specific address.

checkpoints.description: Returns the checkpoints for a specific account.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

delegates.description: Returns the current delegate of a specific address.

getPastTotalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens at a specific block number.

getPastVotes.description: Returns the number of votes for a specific account at a specific block number.

getRoleAdmin.description: Returns the admin role for a specific role.

getRoleMember.description: Returns a member of a specific role at a given index.

getRoleMemberCount.description: Returns the number of members in a specific role.

getVotes.description: Returns the number of votes for a specific address.

grantRole.description: Grants a specific role to an account.

hasRole.description: Checks if an account has a specific role.

renounceRole.description: Renounces a specific role for the caller.

revokeRole.description: Revokes a specific role from an account.

supportsInterface.description: Checks if the contract implements a specific interface.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

nonces.description: Returns the current nonce for a specific address.

numCheckpoints.description: Returns the number of checkpoints for a specific account.

delegate.description: Delegates voting power to a specified address.

delegateBySig.description: Delegates voting power to a specified address via a signed message.
